sentences.english: The whaling fleet began to fill away on a northerly course.
sentences.chinese: 捕鯨船隊開始向北乘風前進。

sentences.english: In another series, activists go up against whaling ships.
sentences.chinese: 另一系列中，積極人士對抗捕鯨船。

sentences.english: The Pequod was a fairly small whaling ship the was sailing the next day.
sentences.chinese: 佩廓德號是一條相當小的捕鯨船，次日就要出海了。

sentences.english: They will try to interfere with or disable the Japanese whalers.
sentences.chinese: 他們將試圖干擾日籍捕鯨船的行動或令其無功而返。

sentences.english: The novel's epilogue tempers the tragic destruction of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 小說的後記部分淡化了捕鯨船悲慘毀滅的一幕。
